Title: Lesson 1 How Do You Feel?
Content: 本单元我们讲学习冷暖凉热四种感官hot, cold, cool, warm,四季:spring, summer, autumn, winter,7种天气:sunny/rainy/windy/cloudy/snowy/rainy windy/cloudy windy ,以及春夏秋冬季的服饰: jeans牛仔裤, hat帽子;T-shirt T恤,dress连衣裙, skirt短裙, raincoat雨衣.boots靴子,sweater毛衣,jacket夹克,coat大衣;以及一本科学小书,学习第二种天气的表达方式。本节课我们学习63-64课时  Unit 5 Seasons and Weather Lesson 1 How Do You Feel? 主要学习内容如下:【1】学习四个感官词 :hot 热, cool 凉快, warm 暖和 , cold 冷 您在家里可以利用周围的环境,问宝贝儿: How do you feel?引导宝贝儿说: I feel hot/cool/warm/cold. 【2】引导学生用肢体表达冷暖：Can you show me I feel cool/warm/cold/hot? 【3】学习冷色cool color和暖色 warm color. Cool Colors冷色有: blue, green, purple; Warm Colors暖色有: red, yellow, orange.  Can you speak out a cool/warm color? Yes. Blue/yellow is a cool/warm color.

Title: Lesson 2 Four Seasons
Content: 本节课我们学习65-66课时Unit 5 Seasons and Weather Lesson 2 Four Seasons四季主要学习内容如下:【1】学习四季 spring 春季  summer  夏天  autumn 秋天  winter  冬季 关键句:How many seasons are there in a year?    There are four seasons in a year. They are spring, summer, autumn, winter. 【2】引导学生理解四季的感受:How do you feel in spring/summer/autumn/winter.  I feel warm in spring. I feel hot in summer. I feel cool in autumn. I feel cold in winter;【3】简单理解四季的特征:I can see sprouting flowers in spring. I can eat ice-cream and watermelon in summer. I can see yellow and red leaves in autumn. I can see a snowman in winter. 四季是宝贝儿们学习中的难点,孩子们可能掌握得不是特别好,您不要着急,慢慢引导宝贝儿,宝贝儿们慢慢就可以理解了。

Title: Lesson 3 Sunny and Windy
Content: 本节课我们学习67-68课时 Unit 5 Seasons and Weather Lesson3 Sunny and Windy 主要学习内容如下:【1】学习两种天气 sunny晴天和windy刮风天气What's the weather like (today)?  孩子回答: It's a sunny/windy day.【2】引导孩子理解不同天气的温度变化: How do you feel on a sunny/windy day? 孩子回答:I feel hot/warm on a sunny day. I feel cool/cold on a windy day. 【3】引导学生用肢体表达天气     Can you show me a sunny/windy day?  It’s sunny/windy.

Title: Lesson 4  rainy and cloudy
Content: 本节课我们学习69-70课时  Unit 5 Seasons and Weather  Lesson 4  rainy and cloudy主要学习内容如下:【1】学习两种天气 rainy下雨天和cloudy多云天气What's the weather like (today)?  孩子回答: It's a rainy/cloudy day.【2】引导孩子理解不同天气的温度变化: How do you feel on a rainy/cloudy day?     孩子回答:   I feel cool/cold on a  rainy/cloudy day. 【3】引导学生用肢体表达天气      Can you show me a  rainy/cloudy day?【4】引导学生用hot/cold表达天气: It's a hot/cold day (today).【5】复习交际用语: (1) 复习日常打招呼 Hi, boys and girls.  Hello, Jackie.  Goodbye. See you later. (2) How are you (today)？ 引导学生学会新的问法: How are you doing? 回答: I'm pretty good. Thank you.  How about you?/And you?(3)May I come in? 回答 Sure, please come in. 【6】复习课堂指令: Stand up.      Sit down.     Come here.     Turn around.       Walk!   Run !    Go !      Stop! 【温馨提示】cloudy 和 overcast  都有阴天的意思,但是天气预报阴转晴的时候,习惯用overcast. 例如 During the daytime, it will be overcast, turning clear later. 今天白天,阴转晴。Go stop 是美国孩子经常玩儿的游戏,有好多种玩儿法,您在家里也可以买些 go stop的益智玩具和宝贝儿一起玩儿~

Title: Lesson 5  cloudy windy and  rainy windy
Content: 本节课我们学习71-72课时 Unit 5 Seasons and Weather Lesson 5  cloudy windy and  rainy windy主要学习内容如下:【1】学习两种天气:cloudy windy 阴天刮风天气和 rainy windy下雨刮风天气学习天气的另一种问法:How is the weather?  It's a cloudy windy / rainy windy day. 【2】引导孩子理解不同天气的温度变化:  How do you feel on a cloudy windy/rainy windy day? 孩子回答:   I feel cool/cold on a cloudy windy/rainy windy day. 【3】引导学生用肢体表达天气      Can you show me a cloudy windy day/ rainy windy day【4】复习交际用语: How are you doing?   I'm pretty good.  How about you? /And you? 您可以给宝贝儿解释下,在遇到外国人,不知道第一句话说什么的时候,就可以用一句 How are you doing? 开启话题哦~感谢您的配合！

Title: Lesson 6 Snowy and Warm
Content: 本节课我们学习73-74课时 Unit 5 Seasons and Weather  Lesson 6 Snowy and Warm下雪天和暖和天气主要学习内容如下:【1】学习两种天气: snowy下雪天a warm day雪后太阳出来暖和的天气How is the weather? It’s a snowy/warm day. 【2】引导孩子用肢体表示天气。Can you show me a snowy day?   【3】How do you feel on a snowy day?  I feel cold. 【4】学习下雪天特征:What's this?/What is it?   It's a snowman. 雪人We can play snow-fighting打雪仗/sleigh滑雪橇/skating滑冰/skiing滑雪 on a snowy day. We can make a snowman.  【5】引导学生用warm/cool表达天气: It's a warm/cool day (today).【6】复习本单元学习的所有天气: sunny/rainy/windy/cloudy/snowy/rainy windy/cloudy windy

Title: Lesson 7 What Will You Wear? (1)
Content: 本节课我们学习75-76课时 Unit 5 Seasons and Weather  Lesson 7 What Will You Wear? (1) 天气与穿戴(1) 春秋服饰及夏季服饰。课堂上我们利用课件,让孩子们在不同季节,不同天气 为我们的主人公选择穿戴的衣服。主要学习内容如下:【1】春秋季服饰有:jeans牛仔裤, hat帽子;【2】夏季服饰有:T-shirt T恤,dress连衣裙, skirt短裙, raincoat雨衣.本节课的关键句如下:What will you wear in spring/autumn? I wear jeans/hat in spring/autumn. What will you wear in summer? I wear T-shirt/dress/skirt/raincoat in summer. 对于服饰孩子们可能掌握的不是特别好,我们今后还会反复复习的,请您别着急慢慢引导孩子哈。

Title: Lesson 8 What Will You Wear? (2)
Content: 本节课我们学习77-78课时 Unit 5 Seasons and Weather  Lesson 8 What Will You Wear? (2) 天气与穿戴(2) 冬季服饰。课堂上我们利用课件,让孩子们在不同季节,不同天气 为我们的主人公选择穿戴的衣服。主要学习内容如下:【1】冬季服饰有:boots靴子,sweater毛衣,jacket夹克,coat大衣;【2】本节课的关键句如下:What will you wear in winter? I wear boots/sweater/jacket/coat in winter.对于服饰孩子们可能掌握的不是特别好,我们今后还会反复复习的,请您别着急慢慢引导孩子哈。

Title: Lesson 9 What Weather Do You Like?
Content: 本节课我们学习79-80课时  Unit 5 Seasons and Weather  Lesson 9 What Weather Do You Like? 主要学习内容如下:我们学了一本科学小书 Kinds of Weather. 小书内容如下:It is sunny. It is cloudy. It is windy. It is rainy. I like it sunny. 【1】引导学生理解表达天气的第二种说法:It's sunny/cloudy/rainy/snowy/windy.【2】引导学生表达自己喜欢的天气:What weather do you like? I like it sunny/ I like sunny day.今天我们还复习了本单元的所有知识。
